code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import dataReducer from"./data";import popupReducer from"./popup";import categoriesReducer from"./categories";import currentUserReducer from"./user";import cartReducer from"./cartStore";import billReducer from"./bill";var store=configureStore({reducer:{popup:popupReducer,data:dataReducer,categories:categoriesReducer,currentUser:currentUserReducer,cart:cartReducer,bill:billReducer}});export default store;
